description: In order to select your theme, you must place your DVTCOLORTHEME file in the ~/​Library/​Developer/​Xcode/​UserData/​FontandColorThemes directory. If the "FontandColorThemes" folder doesn't exist yet, simply create that folder and restart Xcode. Then, you can select your color theme in the application. Select Xcode → Preferences... , choose "Fonts & Colors, and select your theme.
NOTE: In Xcode 4, DVTCOLORTHEME files replaced .XCCOLORTHEME files.
